gw.api.exposure

Class ExposureFilterSetBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.filters.FilterSetBase
      • gw.api.exposure.ExposureFilterSetBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ABContactExposureFilterSet, OwnedRelatedExposureFilterSetBase

    public class ExposureFilterSetBase
extends FilterSetBase
    Base exposure filter set containing filters available in all exposure filter sets.

        public com.guidewire.pl.system.filters.QueryBasedQueryFilter getStateFilter(ExposureState state)
        Simple filter - is exposure state equal to given value.
        Parameters:
        state - The ExposureState to filter against.
        Returns:
        filter that filters exposures not in state state

        Simple filter - is exposure's claim state open.
        Returns:

        Returns:

      • getCreatedLastNDaysFilter

        public com.guidewire.pl.system.filters.QueryBasedQueryFilter getCreatedLastNDaysFilter(int days)
        Simple filter - was exposure created in last N days.
        Parameters:
        days - Exposures created before this number of days ago are filtered out.
        Returns:
        filter that filters exposures not created within days days.

      • getOpenNewFilter

        public com.guidewire.pl.system.filters.QueryBasedQueryFilter getOpenNewFilter()
        Compound filter - is exposure state open and was it created in last business week?
        Returns:
        filter that passes through open exposures created in the last business week.

      • getClosedLastNDaysFilter

        public com.guidewire.pl.system.filters.QueryBasedQueryFilter getClosedLastNDaysFilter(int days)
        Compound filter - is exposure state closed and is close date in last N days?
        Parameters:
        days - number of days in the past within which the Exposure was closed.
        Returns:
        filter that filters exposures not closed within days days.
